function NPC_102110:Init( NPCID ) --[[ USERDATA 1 : 머리 파츠 데미지 누적 2 : 손톱 파츠 데미지 누적 3 : Pain패턴을 보이기 위한 데미지 누적 --]] NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 5 )
--NPC_102110.LimitForPain = 1 NPC_102110.LimitForPain = NPC_102110.MaxHP/10 NPC_102110.LimitForBreakNail = NPC_102110.MaxHP/20
NPC_102110.TalIdLeapFront = 210211009 NPC_102110.TalIdLeapFarFront = 210211010 NPC_102110.TalIdLeapLeft = 210211011 NPC_102110.TalIdLeapFarLeft = 210211012 NPC_102110.TalIdLeapRight = 210211013 NPC_102110.TalIdLeapFarRight = 210211014 NPC_102110.TalIdLeapBack = 210211015 NPC_102110.TalIdLeapFarBack = 210211016 NPC_102110.TalIdLeapSelf = 210211017
NPC_102110.TalIdLeapFront2 = 210211031 NPC_102110.TalIdLeapBack2 = 210211032 NPC_102110.TalIdLeapSelf2 = 210211033
NPC_102110.TalIdIceBall1 = 210211019 NPC_102110.TalIdIceBall2 = 210211020 NPC_102110.TalIdIceBall3 = 210211021 NPC_102110.TalIdIceBall4 = 210211022
NPC_102110.TalIdTurnLeft = 210211001 NPC_102110.TalIdTurnRight = 210211002
NPC_102110.TalIdRage = 210211003 NPC_102110.TalIdSniffle = 210211023 -- 훌쩍거림 NPC_102110.TalIdLookAround = 210211024 NPC_102110.TalIdThreat = 210211004 -- 냉기포효
NPC_102110.TalIdPain1 = 210211005 NPC_102110.TalIdPain2 = 210211006 NPC_102110.NpcIdIceBallDummy = 102117 end
function NPC_102110:SearchAndIceballAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) --GLog("NPC_102110:SearchAndIceballAttack\n") if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_102110.TalIdIceBall1 ) then return end
local New = ThisNPC:Aggro( "far", 0 ) if not New then return end
local Dist = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( New ) if Dist > 900 then NPC_102110:IceballAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) end end
function NPC_102110:IceballAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local n = math.random( 0, 3 )
if n == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_102110.TalIdIceBall1, Enemy ) elseif n == 1 then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_102110.TalIdIceBall2, Enemy ) elseif n == 2 then ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_102110.TalIdIceBall3, Enemy ) else ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_102110.TalIdIceBall4, Enemy ) end end
function NPC_102110:SmartIdle( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local IsRear = Enemy:IsRear( ThisNPC )
if IsRear then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_102110.TalIdLookAround ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_102110.TalIdSniffle ) end end
function NPC_102110:SlidingAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local IsRear = Enemy:IsRear( ThisNPC )
if IsRear then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_102110.TalIdLeapFarBack ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_102110.TalIdLeapFarFront ) end end
function LineAngle(vec1, vec2) local vec = {}
vec.x = vec2.x - vec1.x; vec.y = vec2.y - vec1.y;
local th = math.atan2(vec.x, -vec.y)
th = th * 57.295 -- th := th / PI * 180; if th < 0.0 then th = 360 + th end
return math.floor(th) end
-- 점프공격 방향을 체크해서 회전없이 바로 탤런트를 사용한다. -- 300 미터 안쪽이면 제자리 점프 공격 -- 그외에는 해당 방향으로 점프 공격 -- 일단 좌우 체크가 되지 않아 앞뒤 체크만 수행
function NPC_102110:LeapAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) --GLog( "Leap Attack\n" ) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_102110.TalIdLeapSelf ) then return end
local dist = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) --AsNPC(ThisNPC):SayNow("거리 : "..dist) if dist < 600 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_102110.TalIdThreat ) return elseif 1000 < dist then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_102110.TalIdLeapFarFront ) return end
--GLog( "GetDir : " .. ThisNPC:GetDir().x ..", ".. ThisNPC:GetDir().y ..", ".. ThisNPC:GetDir().z .. "\n" ) --GLog( "GetFowardDir : " .. ThisNPC:GetFowardDir(Enemy).x .. ", "..ThisNPC:GetFowardDir(Enemy).y .. ", "..ThisNPC:GetFowardDir(Enemy).z .. "\n ") --GLog( "GetDir, GetFowardDir " .. LineAngle(ThisNPC:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetFowardDir(Enemy)) .. "\n" ) local vec = {x=0, y=0} local myangle = LineAngle(ThisNPC:GetDir(), vec) local yourangle = LineAngle(ThisNPC:GetFowardDir(Enemy), vec) local angle = yourangle - myangle
--GLog( "GetFowardDir-GetDir" .. angle .. "\n") --GLog( "GetDir, 0 " .. myangle .. "\n" ) --GLog( "GetFowardDir, 0 " .. yourangle .. "\n" )
if angle < 0 then angle = angle + 360 end
if 65 < angle and angle < 110 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_102110.TalIdLeapLeft ) --AsNPC(ThisNPC):SayNow( myangle.." "..yourangle.." "..angle.." 왼\n" ) elseif 140 <= angle and angle <= 220 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_102110.TalIdLeapBack ) --AsNPC(ThisNPC):SayNow( myangle.." "..yourangle.." "..angle.." 뒤\n" ) elseif 250 < angle and angle < 295 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_102110.TalIdLeapRight ) --AsNPC(ThisNPC):SayNow( myangle.." "..yourangle.." "..angle.." 오른\n" ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_102110.TalIdLeapFront ) --AsNPC(ThisNPC):SayNow( myangle.." "..yourangle.." "..angle.." 앞\n" ) end
end
function NPC_102110:ProcessAccDamage( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) local DmgAcc = 0 -- Acc damage parts if PartsIdx <= 2 and ThisNPC:GetMode() == 1 then DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( PartsIdx ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( PartsIdx, DmgAcc ) end
-- Acc for pain DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, DmgAcc )
--[[ GLog( "-- Process Acc Damage Root ( P:" .. PartsIdx .. ", D:" .. HitInfo.Damage .. ", 1:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) .. ", 2:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) .. ", 3:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) .. ", 4:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 4 ) .. ", 5:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 5 ) .. " ) --\n" ) --]]
-- Process reaction
-- break nail if PartsIdx == 2 and ThisNPC:GetMode() == 1 and ( not ThisNPC:CheckBPart(2) ) and DmgAcc > NPC_102110.LimitForBreakNail then
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_102110.TalIdPain2 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( 2, HitInfo.Attacker ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( 3, HitInfo.Attacker ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, 0 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, 0 ) return end
if DmgAcc > NPC_102110.LimitForPain and ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() ~= NPC_102110.TalIdRage and ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) then
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_102110.TalIdPain1 ) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_102110.TalIdThreat ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, 0 ) return end
end
function NPC_102110:OnFinishLookAround(ThisNPC, Enemy) ThisNPC:FaceTo(Enemy) end
